attributes.action: For the government to acknowledge the offense and hurt caused by the attacks on are freedom by Islam.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For over ten years now in Britain and the rest of the Non-Islamic World, we have been subjected to repeated attacks on us by the followers of the religion of Islam. We have been threatened and have had to endure repeated attempts, and some successful attacks, on our freedom of thought, will, and speech.

I am asking the government to recognise the hurt, anger, and fear caused by those attacks. Which have even involved prominante British Muslims, publicly declaring that British citizens should be killed for practising their right to freedom of speech. And for them to except that they been making wrongfully apologies on our behalf, without our consent. That includes they apology made for the Danish magazine which was practising its right to freedom of the press, which the government that has invaded two Muslim countries called "irresponsible" while Danish and other European countries embassies burnt, and their citizens fled Islamic countries!

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions that simply call for the "acknowledgement" that some particular point of view is correct.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
